        WriteAttributeResults handleWrite(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> attributes)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Handle the write call

        e.g. performs a write call to a subsystem

        Parameters:
        attributes - the attributes to write
        Returns:
        a list of handled attributes including their result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong
